Name: Glenn's Bride
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This serious, bourbon based cocktail ranks alongside the Sazerac in its aromatic complexity.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2005 by Julian Gibbs, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Glenn's Bride contains 224 calories
